guards.private: Only you can open this session.
guards.link: Anyone with the link can view this session.

home.title: Train smarter. Share progress. Celebrate consistency.
home.description: FitVibe helps athletes and coaches plan, log, and analyse every session. A modern toolkit for streak tracking, leaderboard heatmaps, and meaningful recovery insights.
home.subtitleOnlineFallback: API connection looks healthy � ready when you are.
home.subtitleOffline: We will keep everything cached locally until the backend returns.
home.subtitleChecking: Checking the API health and warming caches...
home.chartDescription: Seven-day completion rate across planned training sessions.

login.title: Log back in to continue your training streak.
login.description: We rotate login tokens automatically and enforce session hygiene so you can rely on FitVibe for competition prep and daily discipline.
login.error: We could not verify your credentials. Please try again.

register.title: Register to unlock collaborative training.
register.description: Create your athlete profile, set training preferences, and invite your coach. We'll keep sensitive data private by default.
register.successDescription: We've sent a verification link to your inbox. Click the link to activate your account and start training.
register.error: We could not create your account. Please retry shortly.

profile.title: Dial in preferences, privacy, and performance goals.
profile.description: Define visibility defaults, preferred units, and personal best milestones so every shared session reflects your story.

visibility.title: Visibility
visibility.description: Default session visibility set to Followers. Switch to Public for comp prep recaps.

units.title: Preferred units
units.description: Weight in kilograms � Distance in kilometers � Pace in min/km.

achievements.title: Signature achievements
achievements.description: 180 kg back squat � 115 kg bench � 210 kg deadlift � Boston Marathon qualifier.

share.title: Share links
share.description: Create personal share links for external coaches or event judges. Revoke any link instantly if access should be removed.

guards.active: Share this URL with trusted teammates.
guards.revoked: This link is no longer accessible.

feed.title: Share progress with teammates and followers.
feed.description: The feed filters sessions by visibility, so private work stays private while public achievements earn rightful hype.

leah.note: Hit a new 5RM on deadlifts at 170 kg � grip work is paying off!

marco.note: Shared a deload session plan with ankle rehab protocol.

team.note: Weekly leaderboard: Emma reclaimed the #1 spot with 98 streak points.

footer.note: Built for athletes who love data-driven progress � FitVibe Labs

errors.WEAK_PASSWORD: Password must be at least 12 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, digit, and symbol
errors.PASSWORD_CONTAINS_EMAIL: Password cannot contain your email address
errors.AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED: Your verification link has expired. Please request a new one
errors.AUTH_TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Verification limit reached. Please try again later
errors.AUTH_INVALID_SCOPE: Specify a sessionId or revoke scope
errors.USER_USERNAME_INVALID: Username must be 3-50 characters and may include letters, numbers, dot, underscore, and dash
errors.EXERCISE_DUPLICATE: Exercise name already exists in this library scope
errors.EXERCISE_FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to modify this exercise
errors.SESSION_INVALID_SOURCE: Source session has invalid planned date
errors.FEED_AUTH_REQUIRED: Authentication required for requested feed scope
errors.FEED_NOT_OWNER: You do not own this session
errors.FEED_INVALID_STATUS: Only completed sessions can be shared
errors.FEED_INVALID_EXPIRES_AT: expiresAt must be a valid ISO date
errors.POINTS_INVALID_LIMIT: Limit must be a positive integer
errors.POINTS_INVALID_FROM: From must be a valid ISO timestamp
errors.POINTS_INVALID_TO: To must be a valid ISO timestamp
errors.IDEMPOTENCY_MISMATCH: Idempotency key already used with a different payload
errors.IDEMPOTENCY_INVALID: Idempotency-Key header must not be empty

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 12 characters long
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must include a lowercase letter
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must include an uppercase letter
validation.usernameFormat: Username may only contain letters, numbers, underscores, dots, or dashes

dashboard.title: Your training command center.
dashboard.description: Monitor streaks, readiness, and leaderboard deltas at a glance. Every metric updates in real-time once sessions sync from wearables or manual logs.
dashboard.errorRefresh: We could not refresh analytics right now. Showing the last loaded snapshot.
dashboard.helperText: Showing up to 5 periods to keep payloads light on shared dashboards.

progress.title: Visualize progression with context
progress.description: Compare block-over-block volume, velocity, and readiness to understand how programming tweaks translate to results.
progress.noData: No data available for this period
progress.noExerciseData: No exercise data available for this period

verifyEmail.descVerifying: Please wait while we verify your email address...
verifyEmail.descSuccess: Your email has been successfully verified. Redirecting you to login...
verifyEmail.descFailed: We couldn't verify your email. The link may have expired or is invalid.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.descSuccess: If an account exists with that email address, we've sent instructions to reset your password.
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.successMessage: Please check your email for the password reset link.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.descSuccess: Your password has been successfully reset. Redirecting to login...
resetPassword.description: Enter your new password below to reset it.
resetPassword.successText: You can now log in with your new password.
resetPassword.invalidToken: Invalid reset token. Please request a new password reset.

logger.title: Capture every rep without losing flow.
logger.description: Whether you're in the gym or syncing from wearables, the logger tracks sets, RPE, and tempo so your data stays coach-ready.

planner.title: Design training blocks with intent.
planner.description: Drag, duplicate, and periodise workouts. Planner keeps intensity, volume, and deload ratios aligned with your macrocycle.

notFound.title: We couldn't find that page.
notFound.description: The route you requested is either private or still under construction. Head back to the dashboard or talk to the team if you need early access.

maintenanceBanner.message: System is currently in read-only mode. Write operations are disabled.
